name: Champion's Battlegear
tooltip:
Champion's Battlegear

Bring 15 Cenarion Combat Badges, 20 Cenarion Logistics Badges, 20 Cenarion Tactical Badges and 1 Mark of Cenarius to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also attain Exalted reputation with Cenarion Circle to be able to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Cenarion Combat Badge x 15
- Cenarion Logistics Badge x 20
- Cenarion Tactical Badge x 20
- Mark of Cenarius
- Cenarion Circle:
